pages.title: A Harder World
pages.text: Survival is no longer passive. The world itself slowly wears you down.$(br2)All players now accumulate $(6)Exhaustion$() over time â€” even while standing still.$(br2)Exhaustion drains $(e)Saturation$() first, then $(c)Hunger$().

pages.title: Altitude
pages.text: Above $(b)Y=100$(), the air grows thin.$(br)The higher you climb, the faster exhaustion builds.$(br2)Mountains and sky builds require serious food preparation.

pages.title: Temperature
pages.text: Extreme climates increase fatigue.$(br2)Hot deserts and freezing tundras both raise passive exhaustion.$(br)Temperate biomes are safest for long-term survival.
